source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SEQ_00<tab>Poor Gascot just wants some Qestiri friends.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SEQ_00<tab>再会の市のガスコットは、ケスティル族と親睦を深める方法を考えているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SEQ_01<tab>In light of Gascot's dance failing to capture the locals' hearts and minds, he suggests you try a different approach: improving his reputation with the other tribes first. Gascot believes advertising his wares in Reunion to a range of tribes will increase the demand for his goods, putting pressure on the Qestir to allow him to trade. You agree to help promote his goods to the Au Ra that have only recently come to Reunion.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SEQ_01<tab>ガスコットから、ケスティル族ではなく、その周辺にいる者たちに売り込もうと提案された。再会の市に到着したばかりの人を探して話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SEQ_02<tab>A Gesi by the name of Jebei shows he is quite interested in trading with Gascot. He explains that his tribe values hunting above all else and would have use for Gascot's foreign weapons. You are also told that the Qestir are in constant need of oil to keep the lamps of Reunion alight. In light of this, Jebei encourages you to retrieve a lump of fat from a steppe gedan and present it to Cotota as a gesture of goodwill.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SEQ_02<tab>ゲシ族のジェベイが興味を示し、案を出してくれた。ケスティル族に取り入るため、アジムステップの刃の海にいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2168E01 /var>」を倒して、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D3501 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SEQ_03<tab>Having slain the beast mentioned by Jebei and collected its fat, you make your way back to Reunion to present the spoils to Gascot.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SEQ_03<tab>「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2168E01 /var>」を倒して、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D3501 /var>」を入手した。再会の市に戻り、「ガスコット」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D3501 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SEQ_04<tab>Gascot is pleased to see your venture was a success. He states that Jebei gave him some choice advice while you were away and that he is quite keen to follow it. You are bid to go and hand over the beast fat to Cotota on Gascot's behalf.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SEQ_04<tab>ガスコットは、先ほどのジェベイから助言を受けていたらしい。ケスティル族に取り入るため、再会の市にある族長の天幕に向かい、「コトタ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D3501 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SEQ_05<tab>Cotota seems puzzled to see you again. You hand her the fat and explain the reason for your visit. However, her reaction is far from positive, and you cannot help but wonder if Jebei's advice to Gascot is somehow to blame.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SEQ_05<tab>コトタに「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D3501 /var>」を渡して説明したところ、ひどく驚愕された。ジェベイが、ガスコットに助言をしていたのが、彼女の驚きの原因のようだが……？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Au Ra that have recently arrived in Reunion.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_TODO_00<tab>再会の市に到着したばかりの人を探す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_TODO_01<tab>Obtain fat from a steppe gedan.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2168E01 /var>からまれに得られる<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D3501 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the steppe gedan fat to Gascot.
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_TODO_03<tab>Present the steppe gedan fat to Cotota.
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_000<tab>In consideration of the fact that showing my enthusiasm through dance had little effect, I suggest we consider a new approach.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_000<tab>ふーむ、身体を動かしてアピールしても無駄だというなら、
少しばかり、手法を変える必要がありそうですねえ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_001<tab>Instead of approaching the Qestir directly, we focus on improving my reputation with the other tribes!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_001<tab>……そうだ、ケスティル族に直接訴えかけるのではなく、
ほかの部族の信頼を得ることで、評判を高めましょう！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_002<tab>As I have previously mentioned, I brought countless goods with me from faraway lands─the likes of which the Xaela have never seen! If I advertise these wares in Reunion there will be crowds begging to trade with me in no time.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_002<tab>異国から持ち込んだ、数々の便利な品物があると、
再会の市で宣伝をして、私の出店を望む人を増やすんです！
きっと、興味を示す人がいるはず！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_003<tab>Would you be up to the task of promoting my goods to those that have only just arrived in Reunion? I shall focus on the group that enjoyed my Bomb Dance performance─no doubt they are eager to see me again.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_003<tab>あなたは、市に到着したばかりの人に売り込んでもらえますか？
私は、先ほど踊りを見てくれた人に声をかけましょう。
今なら、私への親しみも増しているでしょうから！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_005<tab>I am struggling to recall just who was present for my dance, but do not worry yourself, it will come to me soon. Please advertise my wares to those that have recently arrived in Reunion.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_005<tab>さて、私のボム踊りを見ていた人は誰だったか……。
あ、冒険者さんも私の商品を売り込んでもらえますか？
再会の市に到着したばかりの人がいいですね！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_010<tab>You say that there's a merchant about selling weapons from foreign lands? Interesting indeed. But why did you think to tell me of this fact?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_010<tab>……異国の、様々な道具を持ち込んだ商人がいるだと。
ふむ……それは、確かに興味深い話だ……。
だが、何故、それを俺に話す？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_011<tab>The poor man's been denied permission to trade in Reunion? Well, I can certainly see why they'd turn him away if that's what he's selling. Though that works well for me─that is to say, he has my deepest sympathies!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_011<tab>……なんと、ケスティル族から出店を断られているのか！
確かに、扱う商品からすると、奴らもそういう判断を……。
それは都合がいい……いや、大変だな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_012<tab>We Gesi are skilled hunters; certainly the most capable of all the Xaela tribes. We fully understand the importance of weaponry.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_012<tab>俺たちゲシ族は、狩りを得意とする部族。
特に手槍を投げさせたら、草原でいちばんの腕だろう。
だからこそ、ほかの部族より道具の有用性を理解しているつもりだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_013<tab>I for one would certainly like to see your friend given permission to trade. In fact, I'll even give him some advice on how to plead his cause.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_013<tab>ぜひ、ガスコットの店を俺も利用させてもらいたい。
彼が商売できるように、俺が助言してやろうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_014<tab>While I am talking with the merchant, I would advise you continue your efforts to win over the Qestir.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_014<tab>見たところ、お前は相当に腕がたちそうだ。
……そうだな、俺がガスコットと話してみてやるから、
お前は、ケスティル族に少しでも取り入ってくるといい。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_015<tab>Something you may wish to keep in mind: the Qestir are always in need of oil to keep the lanterns lit in Reunion.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_015<tab>彼らは、市の維持のため、常に火を絶やさぬようにしている。
そのため、油が不足がちのはずだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_016<tab>Slay a steppe gedan and bring back a lump of its fat. The Qestir are sure to appreciate the gesture.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_016<tab>周囲の「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2168E01 /var>」を狩ってまわり、
奴らの「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D3501 /var>」を取ってきてやるといい……。
ケスティル族は、きっと喜ぶだろう……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_017<tab>In the meantime, I will tell your friend all about trading in Reunion. I shall see to it he knows absolutely <var 1A 02 /var>everything<var 1A 01 /var>. Oh yes...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_017<tab>その間に、俺はその「ガスコット」という商人に、
ここで商売をするための知恵を貸してやるとするか……。
お前の狩りが終わるまで、ゆっくりとな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_020<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, this gentleman says he is your acquaintance. He certainly seems keen to help.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_020<tab>協力してくれそうな人が現れたんですか！
いやー、幸先がいいですねえ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_025<tab>Slay a steppe gedan and bring back a lump of its fat. I shall give your friend some advice in the meantime.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_025<tab>「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2168E01 /var>」を狩ってまわり、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D3501 /var>」を取ってこい。
お前が戻る頃には、「ガスコット」との話も終わってるだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_030<tab>I knew that beast would be no match for you. I also knew Gascot would be no match for my cunning scheme. What's that? Did I say something? No, of course not. Heh heh...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_030<tab>無事に戻ってくるあたり、やはりお前は腕が立つ。
こいつと話している間、お前を遠ざけておいて正解だったぜ。
いや、なんでもないさ……くくく……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_040<tab>Hello again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Jebei has told me everything. I hear you are going to procure some beast fat?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_040<tab>…………あ、冒険者さん。
この人から、話は聞きましたよ……。
なんでも、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D3501 /var>」を取りに出ていたとか。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_041<tab>Excellent. Let us present this to the Qestir, as Jebei suggested, and earn their trust.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_041<tab>なるほど、必需品の獣脂をケスティル族に贈り、
彼らに、こちらの誠意を見せるという作戦ですね……？
ジェベイさんの発案のようですが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_042<tab>A wise decision. You would do well to follow my advice if you wish to trade here.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_JEBEI_000_042<tab>そのとおり、俺の助言を聞いておけば間違いない。
お前は、ここで商売がしたいんだろう……？
俺の話に乗るかどうか、よく考えておけ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_043<tab>What did we talk about, you ask? Nothing especially interesting. He merely gave me some guidance as to how I could secure permission to trade here.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_043<tab>……えっ、彼と何を話したのかって？
いえ、別に大したことじゃありませんよ……。
商売の許可をもらうための助言をされただけで……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_044<tab>Speaking of which, thank you for gathering the steppe gedan fat. Could you give it to Cotota for me? There's something else that requires my attention.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_044<tab>……あ、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D3501 /var>」、ありがとうございます。
すみませんが、「コトタ」さんに渡してきてもらえませんか？
私は、ちょっと考えたいことがあるので……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_050<tab>Pray give the fat to Cotota. There is something else that requires my attention.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_GASCOT_000_050<tab>すみませんが、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D3501 /var>」を、
「コトタ」さんに渡してきてもらえませんか？
私は、ちょっと考えたいことがあるので……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Cotota is unsure as to why you have visited. Show her you mean well by handing over the steppe gedan fat.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>冒険者が何をしに来たのか計りかねているようだ。
コトタに、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D3501 /var>」を渡して、
意図を伝えよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>Cotota is flabbergasted. You wonder if her reaction has something to do with the advice Jebei gave to Gascot.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ511_02762_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>コトタは驚愕しているようだ。
ゲシ族の青年、ジェベイが、ガスコットに助言をしていたのが、
彼女の驚きの原因のようだが……？
